title: r/Maliciouscompliance I Attended a "Mandatory" Work Meeting from a Hospital Bed
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP's toxic boss decrees that ALL employees must attend a very important meeting no matter what! OP warns her boss that she will be out of office on that day, but the boss basically says "tough luck" and forces OP to show up to the Zoom meeting. So, that's exactly what OP does! She shows up from the hospital bed and utterly embarrasses her boss!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
